tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I have visited first for PCOD & thirod issue.. then I have undergone infertility treatment for 4 to 5 months.. After becoming pregnant i did follow up for 6 months under her.. I was very comfortable with her through out.. Although waiting time should be managed better manner.. She will listen your problem concerns and provide necessary advise.. overall my experience was very much smooth with her.. thanks ma'am.

We are Very much satisfied with Dr.Ashwini madam treatment .she is very polite ,humble towards the patients and she is sophisticated doctor. We got positive result with in short time . Dr Ashwini is top class doctor in Bangalore hence we recommend to all my friends and family members.

I was afraid for the first time and tensed too.But after meeting Ashwini doctor I had some idea that I can overcome with my problem.Doctor treated me very well I was happy with my treatment. First time I got disappointed when the treatment result became negative but doctor said next time surely next time the result would be positive. When my dream came true I was very happy .Thanks to Ashwini doctor and Garbhagudi center.

We consulted many doctors in Bangalore but when we approached  Dr.Ashwini in Garbhagudi center, the life is changed. She is excellent in attitude, very polite and answers all queries with complete empathy that restored our trust in her treatment and I got positive results in short time. We are very thankful to Dr Ashwini for completing our family.

Doctor is good but the staff are very unprofessional.
They just as to wait and wait, if you are very relaxed and have lot of time to waste you should be here.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Certainly will recommend the Doctor.
Doctor toook time out to explain the problem in a very friendly manner.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Visited the doctor for irregular period,and trying to get pregnant.The doctor was super patient in explaining and doing the procedure. She did not hurry up like other doctors. She did IVF, whch was successful now i have a 4 month old baby. She is just awesome.Do not hesitate to meet her! Thank you!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: She is really awesome..... i felt very happy for interaction with her.... she feels very comfortable to discuss any issues and her reply is very satisfactory... i suggest if anyone is suffering with improper thoughts about health issue, u can seriously meet this doctor... she solves any type of health issues and u will be back with smile

Nice to see doctor .... She explain things clearly and friendly
Her way of treating and speaking with patient is good....
Excellent, case to case verification and friendly support from the whole team.Doctor was also very comfortable for me ...
